li.label: utterly hopeless
li.description: There is no hope! Absolutely none! It's a lie! Stop it! I said, STOP IT!!!

li.label: hopeless
li.description: There is no hope. Every day, I struggle to cope with what was given to me by cruel reality.

li.label: somewhat hopeless
li.description: There isn't much hope. I don't know if I have the strength to survive in this.

li.label: indifferent
li.description: I don't feel particularly hopeful or hopeless at the moment.

li.label: somewhat hopeful
li.description: There is a little bit of hope around every little corner of my little, honest life.

li.label: hopeful
li.description: There is hope. I'm sure of it. It soothes my daily life, no matter how rough reality may be.

li.label: extremely hopeful
li.description: There exists hope! The days are bright, and the nights are calm. We walk in confidence and strength.
